LanguageData.OE_SyntheriusDrop.label: syntherius drop
LanguageData.OE_SyntheriusDrop.description: Call for a drop of 100 syntherius.
LanguageData.OE_TionantJellyBundleDrop.label: tionant jelly bundle drop
LanguageData.OE_TionantJellyBundleDrop.description: Call for a drop of 10 blue tionant jelly, 10 green tionant jelly, 10 red tionant jelly and 10 yellow tionant jelly.
LanguageData.OE_MetalBundleDrop.label: obsidia metals bundle drop
LanguageData.OE_MetalBundleDrop.description: Call for a drop of 250 obsidian, 150 mythril and 150 platinum.
LanguageData.OE_SlimeHeartDrop.label: slime hearts drop
LanguageData.OE_SlimeHeartDrop.description: Call for a drop of 8 unconfigured slime heart.
LanguageData.OE_LaborerCallTeam.label: call obsidia laborer team
LanguageData.OE_LaborerCallTeam.description: Call a group of 6 obsidia laborers to assist you for 4 days. These workers can only do general labor tasks. You can control them as though they were your own colonists. You are required to keep them safe.
LanguageData.OMC_Recruit_CallAid.label: call OMC recruits squad
LanguageData.OMC_Recruit_CallAid.description: Call a group of 6 OMC recruits to aid you in battle.
LanguageData.OMC_Basic_CallAid.label: call OMC soldiers squad
LanguageData.OMC_Basic_CallAid.description: Call a group of 6 OMC soldiers to aid you in battle.
LanguageData.OMC_Elite_CallAid.label: call OMC officers squad
LanguageData.OMC_Elite_CallAid.description: Call a group of 6 OMC officers to aid you in battle.
LanguageData.OMC_Elite_CallAidBig.label: call OMC officers big squad
LanguageData.OMC_Elite_CallAidBig.description: Call a group of 10 OMC officers to aid you in battle.

LanguageData.OTC_Recruit_CallAid.description: Call a group of 6 OTC recruits to aid you in battle.

LanguageData.OTC_Basic_CallAid.description: Call a group of 6 OTC mechanics to aid you in battle.

LanguageData.OTC_Elite_CallAid.description: Call a group of 6 OTC engineers to aid you in battle.
LanguageData.OTC_Elite_CallAidBig.label: call OTC engineers big squad
LanguageData.OTC_Elite_CallAidBig.description: Call a group of 10 OTC engineers to aid you in battle.

LanguageData.OCC_Recruit_CallAid.description: Call a group of 6 OCC recruits to aid you in battle.
LanguageData.OCC_Basic_CallAid.label: call OCC knights squad
LanguageData.OCC_Basic_CallAid.description: Call a group of 6 OCC knights to aid you in battle.
LanguageData.OCC_Elite_CallAid.label: call OCC paladins squad
LanguageData.OCC_Elite_CallAid.description: Call a group of 6 OCC paladins to aid you in battle.

LanguageData.OCC_Elite_CallAidBig.description: Call a group of 10 OCC paladins to aid you in battle.

LanguageData.OEC_Recruit_CallAid.description: Call a group of 6 OEC recruits to aid you in battle.
LanguageData.OEC_Basic_CallAid.label: call OEC hunters squad
LanguageData.OEC_Basic_CallAid.description: Call a group of 6 OEC hunters to aid you in battle.

LanguageData.OEC_Elite_CallAid.description: Call a group of 6 OEC inquisitors to aid you in battle.

LanguageData.OEC_Elite_CallAidBig.description: Call a group of 10 OEC inquisitors to aid you in battle.
LanguageData.OE_CallOrbitalSalvo.label: call orbital salvo
LanguageData.OE_CallOrbitalSalvo.description: Call a salvo of orbital strikes around a target position.
LanguageData.OE_CallTransportShuttle.label: call transport shuttle
LanguageData.OE_CallTransportShuttle.description: Call a shuttle for your own use. It will transport colonists, items, and animals anywhere you like within 70 world tiles.
